details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.11 XMP Package - PDF/A Identification Schema.
details.description: The PDF/A Identification Schema has required prefix "pdfaid".

rule.description: The PDF/A Identification Schema has required prefix "pdfaid".

error.message: A PDF/A Identification Schema namespace prefix is %1, but shall be "pdfaid".
